subject: Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Iraq’s Olympic Committee has opened negotiations to try to regain its place in next month’s Beijing Games after being banned for political interference in Olympic affairs. Jazair al-Sahlani, a spokesman for the Iraqi Olympic committee, said that high-level talks had begun with I.O.C. envoys and mediators from Germany and China. But Basil Abdul Mahdi, an adviser to the government’s Ministry of Youth and Sport, said there would be “no retreat” in its decision to replace its Olympic committee.
